price: Guyyaa qabeenyiifi ilmaanis homaa hin fayyadne.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٞ وَلَا بَنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu mālun walā banūna
